mods.abstract: We summarize the theoretical description of charmonium and bottonium production in hadronic collisions and compare it to the available data from hadron-nucleon interactions. With the parameters of the theory established by these data, we obtain predictions for quarkonium production at RHIC and LHC energies.

originInfo.publisher: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD
